name: AI Fantasy Football Name Generator
description: Stuck with a boring fantasy football team name? Let our AI conjure up a legendary moniker that'll strike fear into the hearts of your opponents! Prepare for gridiron glory with a name that's both smart and savage.
introduction: Forget those generic team names! Our AI Fantasy Football Name Generator uses cutting-edge algorithms (okay, maybe just a clever list and some random selection) to craft a name that's as unique as your fantasy football strategy. Get ready to dominate your league with a name that screams victory!
howToUse: First, take a deep breath. The perfect name awaits!
Click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that looks like it wants to be clicked.)
Behold! A magnificent, AI-powered fantasy football team name appears!
Don't like it? Click again! We have an endless supply of awesome.
Once you find the ONE, copy it and brag to your league mates. You deserve it.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually using AI?
faqs.answer: Let's just say it's powered by a highly sophisticated algorithm... of awesomeness. (Okay, it's mostly a random name picker, but it's a *really good* one!)

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other things besides fantasy football?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use them for your D&D character, your pet hamster, or even your next metal band. We won't judge (much).

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! We have tons of combinations. If you *still* don't like them, you might be too picky. But we still love you.

faqs.question: Will a cool name actually help me win my fantasy league?
faqs.answer: Statistically speaking... probably not. But you'll *feel* like a winner, and that's half the battle, right? Plus, intimidation is key.

faqs.question: Are these names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! They're all yours to use, abuse, and plaster all over your fantasy league's message board. Go wild!

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: Definitely! We're always looking to improve our name-generating prowess. Send your suggestions our way!
